dialogues.text: DEVIL'S ADVOCATE - Rev. 1/18/97                         1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) The bodies craning to watch as they roll by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (urgently now)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kevin, really, please...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's right, my son. It's time to step up and take what's yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right.    It's time. Kevin raises the GUN to his temple -- quick and simple -- SNAP! -- he's blown his brains out -- Milton stunned -- disbelieving for a moment and then an aura of fire and heat explodes around him --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nooooooo...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) Kevin starting to fall in SUPER SLOW MOTION and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) The room consumed with fire as the heat explodes around Milton's body and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) Kevin still falling and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) Christabella beating at the flames that now cover her body and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) Kevin still falling and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) The Bas Relief. The clouds are now fire -- the bodies now burning and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) Kevin still falling and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) Milton as his clothes burn away -- as the heat eats away his features --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) as he becomes younger and younger and younger, until suddenly --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) For a moment. He is an angel. An instant of exquisite perfection amidst the flames. And then, just as  --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) suddenly -- HE EXPLODES! -- and we --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) The Bas Relief freezing instantly back into stone -- trapped in tortured, agonizing finality.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) And then, the whole thing just crumbling.   Stone raining down in tiny pieces and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) Kevin in SUPER SLOW MOTION as he falls the final few inches to the floor and at the moment of impact we hear the sound of THUNDER and we --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mirror. And Kevin's face. As THUNDER ECHOES AWAY and becomes nothing more than a FLUSHING URINAL. We're back in Florida. Where we started. Kevin touches his face. His body. His head. He's alive. He touches the mirror. He's insane. He's here. It's now.    WATER RUNNING in the sink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (behind him) It was a nice run. Kev. Had to close out someday. Nobody wins 'em all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Reporter exits.    Kevin alone with the mirror and hi reflection. And then it's over. He's made his decision. Replacing his wedding ring. Reaching for his jacket, as we --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kevin walking through. His game face.     A court officer opening the doors and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kevin entering. Standing there a moment. Searching for Heath in the back of the courtroom. He's not there. A single empty seat. Kevin moving quickly down the aisle. Mary Ann standing there, completely unprepared as Kevin comes in behind her. Embracing her. Holding her tightly to him with a fervor that we alone will understand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Honey, what are you doing? (quietly) Are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kevin nods. Smiles. Backs away. Into his seat.        Get there beside him. Kevin will not look at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All rise for the honorable Justice Garson Deeds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Judge enters.    Takes his seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Barbara) You're still under oath, young lady.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Kevin) Your witness, Mr. Lomax.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your Honor, I'm terribly sorry, but I can no longer represent my client. I need to be replaced as counsel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another silence. But this one isn't very long. There will be chaos in the courtroom. Gettys will freak out and the press will start running for the phones and the Judge will be banging that gavel, as we --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the doors open and the chaos begins to spill into the hallway. Kevin trying to rush away with Mary Ann but right behind them --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kevin! -- Hey! (catching up) Listen, this story -- this is the one, pal -- this is the one you dream about --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is no story.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bullshit. A lawyer with a crisis of conscience? You gotta be kidding. It's huge!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're gonna disbar me, Larry. You can cover that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can they do that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not when I get through with the story. (still walking) You gotta talk, Kevin. You gotta gimme an exclusive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is wire service.     This is 'Sixty Minutes'. This     is a story that needs to be told.     It's you! You're a star!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call me tomorrow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got it.   First thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kevin nods.    Holding Mary Ann's hand as they escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Reporter watching them go for a moment.         Then back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EFX) And as he does, his features change, transforming - that -- into Milton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Milton. Always there. And he smiles.    And we FREEZE FRAME.
